message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I propose a price of $9,500 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. This would be a fair price for both of us, and I believe we can close the deal.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of this, I am willing to consider a price of $9,300 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our interests.
